entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:44 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
